question:
you work for a company. you have seen some information online about a training course that would be useful for your work. write a letter to your manager. in the letter:
* give details of the course
* say how the coarse would be useful
* explain how the company could help you do this course
text: I am writing to inform you that recently I received an email from computer college which is about practical course titled "Machine Learning In Business".

It will start with developers and analyzers of IT companies in a month. The teacher of the course is renowned in the field and also he is working in Google now so the class should be held in the appropriate level.

Learning about machine learning seems to be beneficial for our company by expanding our vision in new border sciences. Moreover, creating a new product based on that could be available too. It leads to accelerating from other competitors in our business.

It is a necessity for the participants to have a recommendation from their own company. So if you agree with participating in the field, let me know to make a list of employees for your recommendation. Besides the financial support needed to be done.
The final deadline for applying is the 25th of July therefore, I look forward to receiving your response.
